document_data.caption: A quirt pictured on the bottom.
document_data.name: Quirt
document_data.mainbody: A '''quirt''' was a short form of [[whip]] used to motivate stubborn [[mount]]s into moving forward.
document_data.Availability: * [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']] sold quirts that fit comfortably in the hand under the "Wilderness Gear" section of the catalogue.
document_data.Trivia: * The year [[110 DR]] was referred to as the "Year of the Quirt".<ref>
